name: Grilled-Onion Guacamole
keywords: appetizer, avocado, onion, serrano chili, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1 large red onion, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the oil, lemon juice, vinegar, pepper, cumin and 3/4 teaspoon salt. Place in a shallow dish, add the onion and let marinate for 1 hour. Heat a grill until hot. Drain the liquid from the onion and place on a grill. Grill for 3 minutes per side. Coarsely chop.

Peel, seed and cut the avocados into 1/2-inch dice. Dice the tomato. Combine the grilled onion, avocados, tomato, garlic, chilies and cilantro. Season to taste with salt and lime juice. Keep at room temperature until ready to serve.
